text: The 13th Niue Assembly was a term of the Niue Assembly. Its composition was determined by the 2008 election, held on June 7, 2008. The Speaker of the 13th Assembly was Atapana Siakimotu. ==Members== The members of the 13th Legislative Assembly were: {| class="sortable wikitable" |- | style="width:30%; text-align:center;"|Name | style="width:20%;
